title: Chronic Disease Monitoring
summary: Use digital tools to support long-term patients with conditions like diabetes and heart failure.
details: Design remote monitoring workflows, alert thresholds, and patient education nudges. Consider device interoperability and clinician workload.

title: Rural Healthcare Access
summary: Bring specialists to underserved communities using telemedicine and outreach.
details: Prototype referral triage, asynchronous consults, and offline-first apps. Include language support and bandwidth constraints.

title: Mental Health Support
summary: Scalable, affordable solutions for mental well-being and early screening.
details: Design digital CBT, peer support, crisis routing, and privacy-preserving analytics. Measure engagement and outcomes.

title: Care Coordination
summary: Reduce fragmentation across providers and settings to improve continuity of care.
details: Build shared care plans, task routing, and cross-org notifications. Consider FHIR, consent, and audit trails.

title: Medication Adherence
summary: Improve adherence for polypharmacy patients with timely reminders and pharmacist follow‑up.
details: Design personalized reminder schedules, refill tracking, and risk stratification. Consider side‑effect reporting and caregiver access.

title: Imaging Triage
summary: Prioritize critical radiology studies for rapid review using AI‑assisted flags.
details: Create safe triage that reduces time‑to‑read. Address drift, calibration, and clinician oversight. Integrate with PACS/RIS.

title: Vaccine Cold‑Chain Tracking
summary: Ensure safe transport of vaccines with IoT temperature logging and alerts.
details: Build sensor ingestion, anomaly alerts, and chain‑of‑custody audit. Handle offline syncing and tamper evidence.

title: Vaccination Scheduling & Equity
summary: Reduce no‑shows and prioritize high‑risk groups using fair scheduling.
details: Design multilingual booking, SMS reminders, walk‑in balancing, and equity‑aware prioritization. Measure coverage gaps.

title: Maternal Health Remote Monitoring
summary: Detect early signs of preeclampsia and complications with home monitoring.
details: Combine BP, symptom check‑ins, and escalation pathways. Include culturally sensitive education and midwife workflows.

title: Antimicrobial Stewardship
summary: Reduce inappropriate antibiotic use with decision support and audit‑feedback.
details: Embed guidelines, local antibiograms, and nudges. Track DOT/DDD metrics and resistance trends.

title: Elder Care Fall Detection & Prevention
summary: Reduce falls at home and in facilities with sensing and risk scoring.
details: Combine ambient sensors, wearable signals, and PT exercises. Address privacy, consent, and false alarms.

title: Oncology Navigation
summary: Streamline patient navigation through complex cancer care pathways.
details: Build appointment orchestration, symptom hotlines, and benefits counseling. Track time‑to‑treatment and PROs.

title: Heart Failure – Chronic Care
summary: Design and evaluate solutions for heart failure within chronic care contexts, balancing outcomes, equity, and clinician workflow.
details: Prototype data pipelines, decision support, and patient engagement. Consider measurement, biases, and secure interoperability (e.g., FHIR).
